segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a total mess with water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's just letting it run like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's standing in it, oblivious and getting her dress wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's gross, soaking the floor and cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this slop, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy's stool is tilting, and he's rummaging in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knows how stale those cookies are anyway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching in too, probably getting crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen needs a good cleaning after this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't make up for the filth inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing such a sloppy, hazardous setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes stacked nearby are just waiting to get splashed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so unnecessarily dirty and careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should turn off that faucet before it's a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR
